changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.comment: Change default value of organization's routeInHouse column to true
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`organization` CHANGE COLUMN `routeInHouse` `routeInHouse` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'1';
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`organization` CHANGE COLUMN `routeInHouse` `routeInHouse` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0';
